content:
On Friday in the morning, the enemy was massively attacked by the Dnipropetrovsk region, there is damage to infrastructure and residential buildings.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

The attack has damaged energy objects in the Dnieper, Kryvyi Rih, Pavlograd and Kamyansky districts.

From the explosive wave, windows in houses are beaten. There are interruptions with light and water supply. Disconnection schedules will be entered.

Sergei Lisak added that last night the enemy fired at Nikopol from heavy artillery once more. No one was injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiaShe has done12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, attacked energy objectsSumy regionand Kharkiv region.

In the Lviv region happenedThe drilling of droneinto the object of energy infrastructure.
title: In the Dnipropetrovsk region due to the attack of the Russian Federation in several districts, energy objects are damaged
description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak. The attack is damaged ...
author: Army Inform
